label: remark-randomness-discipline-perturbation
name: Randomness Discipline Perturbation
content: For each walker $i$, sample the perturbation noise $\xi_i$ independently from the chosen noise law (Gaussian, uniform ball, heat kernel, …), using a per‑walker PRNG stream. If the noise scale $\sigma$ is adapted from $\mathcal S_t$, the mapping $\sigma(\mathcal S_t)$ is deterministic; no shared, additional randomness is introduced at this stage. This enforces within‑step independence required by Assumption A.
